title: The Best (and Easiest) Frozen Yogurt
directions: 1 Whisk yogurt, sugar, and salt together in a mixing bowl until sugar has completely dissolved. Chill in an ice bath or refrigerate until yogurt registers at least 45Â°F on an instant-read thermometer.
2 Churn yogurt in ice cream machine according to manufacturer's instructions. Transfer ice cream to airtight container and chill in freezer for at least 4 to 5 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 quart container (about 3 3/4 cups) full-fat plain yogurt (see note above)
